00023 #ifndef LATTICE_SEMI_DEBUGPRINT_H
00024 #define LATTICE_SEMI_DEBUGPRINT_H
00025 
00026 
00027 #include <syslog.h>
00028 #include <stdarg.h>
00029 
00030 #define MAX_MSG_SIZE 256
00031 
00032 #include "dllDef.h"
00033 
00034 
00035 extern void DLLIMPORT DebugPrint(char *fmtStr, ...);
00036 
00037 #ifdef RELEASE
00038 
00039 #define DEBUGPRINT(a)
00040 #define DEBUGSTR(a)
00041 #define DEBUGSTRNL(a)
00042 #define TRACE()
00043 #define ENTER()
00044 #define LEAVE()
00045 
00046 #else
00047 
00048 // Use this macro like this: DEBUGPRINT(("BAD cnt=%d\n",n));  
00049 #define DEBUGPRINT(a) DebugPrint a 
00050 
00051 #define DEBUGSTR(a) syslog(LOG_INFO, a) // print a string (new line not added)
00052 #define DEBUGSTRNL(a) syslog(LOG_INFO, a)  // print string, (same in linux)
00053 #define TRACE() DebugPrint("%s:%s:%d\n", __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__)
00054 #define ENTER() DebugPrint("ENTER: %s\n", __FUNCTION__)
00055 #define LEAVE() DebugPrint("LEAVE: %s\n", __FUNCTION__)
00056 
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 // Log an error message and print to stdout
00060 #define ERRORSTR(a) syslog(LOG_ERR, a); cout<<a
00061 
00062 #endif
